name: Commonwealth v. The Minds Coal Mining Corporation, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth v. Minds Coal Mining Corp.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth v. The Minds Coal Mining Corporation, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinions for the court below by the learned President Judge of the Orphans’ Court, specially sitting.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Roy J. Keefer, with him William H. Wood and Hull, Leiby & Metzger, for appellant.
David Fuss, Deputy Attorney General, with him T. McKeen Chidsey, Attorney General, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. The Minds Coal Mining Corporation, Appellant.
Argued May 24, 1948.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Roy J. Keefer, with him William H. Wood and Hull, Leiby & Metzger, for appellant.
David Fuss, Deputy Attorney General, with him T. McKeen Chidsey, Attorney General, for appellee.
July 6, 1948:
